name: Ice-Scape
description: All of a sudden, the ground began to shake. The bear turned around and gawked in horror at the sight that transpired before him. "The ice caps are melting!", he heard a penguin screech. Finally,  the day had come... Those blasted humans have been polluting the atmosphere for decades, and now he must pay the price... In that moment there was only one reeling thought that seized the bear's mind. His veins coursing with adrenalin, he spun, and bolted across the ice.
